root.name: Wolfschanze
root.description: You play as a young colonel, a perfect soldier who is the Chief of Staff and a man who has proven his courage during the African campaign. You are aware of the evil caused by the war, understanding its cruelty, senseless, range of crime, destruction and disaster. You cannot accept it any longer, and decide to prevent further tragedies. You realize the need to eliminate Hitler and the whole Nazi system, to end the war quickly -- even at the price of your own life.
